author: David Biller
title: Bolsonaro fires health minister after virus dispute...

content: RIO DE JANEIRO (AP) Brazils President Jair Bolsonaro fired his health minister on Thursday after a series of disagreements over government efforts to contain the new coronavirus. I just heard from the President Jair Bolsonaro the news of my dismissal from the… [+3315 chars]
